overview: In exchange for helping writer-adventurer Lawrence Colby smuggle 300 watch parts into Paris from Switzerland, Martine Randall asks Colby to help solve a complicated situation involving her friend Sabine Manning, a well-known author of sex novels.
tagline: There's a 6ft. redhead karate expert who's writing a sexbook and she... well... don't just stand there...
title: Don't Just Stand There
